alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Rockingham, Caswell, Charlotte, southeastern Pittsylvania and Halifax Counties and the City of Danville through 300 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aspen to Ruffin. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Danville... Reidsville... South Boston... Yanceyville... Bethel... Halifax... and Keysville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
